page.title: 17Newton Farm
page.content: {Newton Farm}is leased form an Industrialist and is farmed part-time by Mr.X. In the last few years, over half the farm has been lost due to the progressive encroachment of the near-by Industrial Estate. Mr.X. regrets this development as it jeopardises not only his livelihood, but also his way of life. Many of the neighbouring farms are also leased from land speculators who have purchased it in the expectation of the Industrial Estate continuing to move outwards so allowing large profits to be made on their investment. Much of the land, at present on the fringe of the Estate, suffers from a phenomenon known as{'Planning Blight'} where land due for development is left sterile and unused pending development which can often take years to materialise.
